name: Spark (itch) (Dino Nuggie Studios)
description:
A short game where you traverse the void like darkness that constantly threatens to consume Thomas. Guide him through the mazes of the abyss to an even darker path.

Spark includes 3 procedurally generated levels filled with simple, yet ambiguous obstacles. Traverse the levels while being constantly aware of your fading light that could leave you with nothing but despair and death.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrow Keys - horizontal input
  • Z - vertical input
  • X + Arrow Keys (directional input) - Dash (has to be done while in the air; similar to celeste dashing mechanic)
  • R - reload procedural level
  • Esc - titlescreen; exit

Beware of not so visible hazards, like spikes in the dark.
